meanings.sent1: The picture was unblurred, so I could see all the details clearly.
meanings.sent2: Her handwriting was unblurred and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The unblurred map helped us find our way without getting lost.
meanings.sent4: His memory of the event was unblurred, as if it happened yesterday.
meanings.sent5: The unblurred sky after the storm was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: To make clear or distinct by removing blurriness
meanings.sent1: She unblurred the photo to reveal the hidden message.
meanings.sent2: The artist unblurred the painting to showcase its intricate details.
meanings.sent3: He unblurred the text on the screen to read it more easily.
meanings.sent4: The magician unblurred the illusion to show how it was done.
meanings.sent5: The detective unblurred the CCTV footage to identify the suspect.
